img_above_text:
![Wukong LowerHollow 23.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/b9/Wukong_LowerHollow_23.jpg)
As a Dragonfly Guai begins to rain arrows down you from a ledge above, check the right side of this passage for a small opening the in the wall, and give the archer the slip.
img_below_text:
On the other side, you'll find a path upward, and you can head right to find a **Meditation Point** for this part of the Hollow, and a smaller opening on the left to ambush the archer on his walkway.
Cave Depths, Lower Hollow Meditation Spot

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," specifically within the Lower Hollow area. The character is navigating through a rocky passage, with a visible Meditation Point highlighted in the background. This point serves as a checkpoint for players to rest and recover. The preceding text mentions avoiding arrows from a Dragonfly Guai and finding an opening in the wall, while the following text guides players to a path upward and the Meditation Point. The image illustrates the player's progress towards this Meditation Point, emphasizing the strategic elements of exploration and survival in the game.
